sen.j: 花人 (かじん) とは、職業が「華道家」、「いけばな作家」、「フラワーアーティスト」、「フラワーデザイナー」などが自らを公の場で称する際に、好んで使うことが多い呼称。
sen.e: Kajin is the naming which was often used by "flower arrangement expert", "Ikebana artist", floral designer" and "flower designer" for preference, when they call themselves in public.
Kajin is the name which "flower arrangement expert,""Ikebana artist,""flower designer," and "flower designer" prefer to call themselves in public.
Kajin is the name which professionals such as 'flower arrangement experts,' 'Ikebana artists,' 'flower artists' and 'flower designers' prefer to call themselves in public.
sen.cmt: flower designerが重複しているのでflower artistにしました。"→'

sen.j: 「花人」とはそもそも花に専従する有名作家らを指し、主に他者からの呼称に限られるべきであるという意見もある。
sen.e: "Kajin" originally referred to famous artists who engage in flowers, and there is another argument that this naming should be limited to use when mostly being called by someone.
Some people say that they should call themselves "Kajin" only when people start to call them "Kajin" because Kajin originally referred to famous artists dedicating themselves in arranging flowers.
sen.cmt: 「意見もある」という述語が文全体にかかるように、文の構造を変えました。
sen.e: Some people say that they should call themselves "Kajin" only when people start to call them "Kajin" because Kajin originally referred to famous artists dedicating themselves in arranging flowers.
